title: OVERLOCK - New font from Tipo
content:
May 12, 2008,Tipo released Overlock, a font designed by Darío Muhafara. Seven styles in OTF format.  
Know more about it at [www.tipo.net.ar/overlock](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173254/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/overlock "www.tipo.net.ar/overlock")

Eduardo Tunni
author: fontime

comments.content: The link is not working, Eduardo.

needs the ".html"

[http://www.tipo.net.ar/overlock.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173254/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/overlock.html "http://www.tipo.net.ar/overlock.html")

Nice face. A bit of an Oz Cooper feel.

Really like it. Nice one.

_('Overlock' will also be featured within [my 'Type releases, worth noting.' series](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173254/http:/for.ma/blog/?p=157), in may. ;) By the way [the '@' of 'Titulata'](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173254/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/images/tipo_titulata/titulata_detalles.png) has to be the most fabulous one I ever saw. Just great.)_

Dav

Thanks to all for your words about Overlock and others.

Eduardo Rodríguez Tunni  
 [www.tipo.net.ar](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014173254/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/ "www.tipo.net.ar")
Nice -- reminds me of Souvenir, Goudy Sans and Auto, without feeling derivative of any of them. And I get the Cooper reference, too, Ken.
